attributes.action: Reopen  non essentials and hospitality sectors with optional safety precautions
attributes.additional_details: Because people are losing their businesses and losing their right to make a living and others are losing motivation to work. Furlough is bleeding money and handing out benefits over a situation that could've been avoided. Handing out benefits to workers while forcing g solation is only going to make them dependent on benefits, causing more strain on our economy. If this continues the hyper inflation could destroy the value of the British pound. We could end up going the way of Venezuela.
attributes.background: Lift the ban on hospitality and non essential shops during lockdown. Aslong as the owners take the safety measures they "deem" necessary. Allowing people to make their own choices and ensure their responsibility.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Allow schools, universities, restaurants and shops to open in March
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572449

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
